channel.title: [508] Help Please [508]
channel.description:
Hello there moparscape players, my names alexis. im using a 508 source called... ahh z508 i belive and would like to no if anyone would make a few short tutorials for me! i really need them since im brand new to this programming, my little cousin wants me to get into this with him while i baby sit him, but really no nothing about it i been serfin threw the website for about a week now, finally found a source i think i could do wonders on i also found a few tutorials so im already started and have "coded" or whatever you guys call it in my source files, but i still need a few more things i have not found a tutorials for these. Anyways back to my questions!
[u][b]Questions:[/b][/u]
[b]A.[/b] Mine and my cousins server has pk systems i was just wondering how i make [titles] for server, such as when somone gets like 150 kills they get a title like starter pking etc, if anyone could help me out i would be sooo greatful
[b]B.[/b] How to make sertain items unspawnable for normal players, or make them pk points i have some stuff for pk points i just dont no where to change them any help? Been trying to do this for about 2 days now :mad: ahhhhh

item.title: [508] Help Please [508]
item.dc:creator: @dylan.hurley dylan.hurley
item.description:
@dylan.hurley wrote:

this code would have made them have a gold crown still would have worked though

[code=java]}else if (c.pkp >=(number 1) && c.pkp <=(number 2){
c2.sendMessage("<shad=255>[(rank you want)]<img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "

  • Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");[/code]
    use that so wil wont make them look like an admin sorry about that

[code=java]}else if (c.pkp >=(number 1) && c.pkp <=(number 2){
c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[(rank you want)]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "

  • Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Help Please [508]
item.dc:creator: @Alexis_Larson Alexis_Larson
item.description:
@Alexis_Larson wrote:

[quote=“dylan.hurley, post:3, topic:419712”]i can help you with this you need to make 2 pont systems 1 for the shop and 1 for tital so if you spend points your tital donesnt go down for the yell tital thing add

[code=java]}else if (c.pkp >=(number 1) && c.pkp <=(number 2){
c2.sendMessage("<shad=255>[(rank you want)]<img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "

  • Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");[/code]

for the rank like noob is number1 =0 and number 2 =25 if you get me then like bigginar number1=26 number 2=50
so what this is saying is if it is higher than number 1 and low than number 2 them get them this tital
and rank you want is like noob master ect

tell me if you dont under stand or if this helped[/quote]

What file should this be in, looks like the right thing! Thanks! i will be soo happy if you tell me what file i should be in! lol been trying to do this forever now!!

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Help Please [508]
item.dc:creator: @Truffler Truffler
item.description:
@Truffler wrote:

Owner_Bryan:

This looks really helpful but the thing is, im really new and wouldnt no where to put this! soo would you be abble to help me out with that or what ? what file

Try client.java in your Source file. Not client.class, you can only open client.java in notepad.
After you put in the code, make sure you compile and restart the server.

Read full topic
